title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Deep Learning Acceleration Workshop Based on Approximate Computing

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: The fundamental principles of approximate computing and their correlation with deep learning acceleration can be explained.
The energy efficiency improvement mechanism using a CMUL-based approximate operator can be demonstrated in a simulation environment.
The optimization process for DNN models compatible with approximate hardware can be implemented through project-based learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
